response_requirements.initial_response_description: For Idaho residents: 3 working days to grant or deny request. If longer time needed: notify in writing and provide records within 10 working days. Non-residents: up to 35 days.
extension_conditions: Longer time needed for Idaho residents: notify in writing within 3 working days, provide records within 10 working days total
response_requirements.no_response_consequence: May file proceedings in district court for wrongful denial

fee_structure.standard_copy_fee: Cannot exceed actual labor and copying costs
fee_structure.search_time_fee: Calculated based on lowest-paid staff member capable of performing task
waiver_criteria: Request contributes significantly to public understanding of government operations or activities
fee_structure.notes: Fees cannot exceed actual labor and copying costs. May waive fees if request serves public understanding.

exemptions.description: Law enforcement records and investigatory records
Records containing trade secrets or commercial information
Records required to be kept confidential by federal law
Computer software developed by agencies for their own use

appeal_process.appeal_description: File proceedings in district court of county where records are located. Court may examine records in camera.
appeal_process.court_jurisdiction: District court of county where records are located

penalties.criminal: Penalties up to $1,000 for public officials who deliberately refuse access improperly
penalties.civil: Court may award reasonable attorney fees and costs if request not frivolously pursued

requester_requirements.specific_format: Request must be made in writing to designated custodian and clearly indicate it is a public records request.
requester_requirements.notes: No residency requirement for access, though response times vary (3 days for residents, 35 days for non-residents). Any person may request access.

specific_obligations: Respond within 3 working days for Idaho residents
Separate exempt and non-exempt material when applicable
Provide written notice if longer time needed
Maintain records according to established schedules

oversight_body.name: None - Court Enforcement
oversight_body.role: No centralized oversight. Enforcement through district court system.
oversight_body.contact_info: Requests must be directed to individual agencies' designated custodians
enforcement_powers: District courts may order immediate disclosure
Courts may award attorney fees and costs
Courts may impose penalties on officials who improperly deny access

validation_metadata.verification_notes: Parsed from official statutory text file. Response time verified against canonical-values.json (3 working days). 11 exemptions parsed from statute.
